QuestData.Title: Ready to Go
QuestData.Description: I suppose now is as good a time to leave as any.$B$BI have my best outfit, my favorite book and my loving cat.$B$BI hope I'm not forgetting anything.$B$BTell that mayor of yours that I'll be on my way. I suppose I'll see you in town with the others!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gwen Armstead in Duskhaven.
QuestData.RewardText: You did the impossible, $N. You convinced Grandma Wahl to leave her home.$B$BYou are something else, let me tell you.
